item.title: Publications
item.description: The used citation style is the Unified Style Sheet for Linguistics. \(\rightarrow\) CSL, BibLaTeX, support for Jabref and Papercite To appear Ehren, Rafael, Timm Lichte, Laura Kallmeyer, Jakub Waszczuk. To appear. Supervised Disambiguation of German Verbal Idioms with a BiLSTM Architecture. ACL Workshop FigLang 2020. 2019 Lichte, Timm, Simon Petitjean, Agata Savary & Jakub Waszczuk. 2019. Lexical encoding formats for multi-word expressions: The challenge of “irregular” regularities. In Yannick Parmentier & Jakub Waszczuk (eds.
